website_summaries.verdict: For consumers who don't need a pair of speakers, this one is a reasonable choice. But sound quality is no better than it is for some lower-priced pairs.
pros: A basic, single in-ceiling speaker with well-made components
Easy to install w/reasonable mid-range acoustics
cons: Low-range sounds aren't as notable as mid-range sounds, and the highs lack clarity
You only get one for the price, which puts it in the higher price range

customer_reviews.title: Good light duty speaker
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good sound for a basic, no frills in-ceiling speaker. I needed to add 1 speaker to a small room in an office and I would best describe it as a light duty speaker; it puts off sound, but don’t expect to be full bass and treble. Music sounds ok, but definitely not mind-blowing. Basic and good for the price if you need a little audio. It did not sound good when I really cranked up the volume, so I would not recommend it for surround sound or home audio, but for light duty its fine.
customer_reviews.author: N. J.

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers, easy to install and quality that is equal too or better than Bose. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I love these speakers. Bought 5 of these to replace my Bose speakers. The Bose were nice but I didn't like the boxes sticking out of my ceiling. Cut the holes for these and they were a breeze to install. The sound quality is equal to or better than the Bose speakers they replaced. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Bays

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sound! Typically easy install
customer_reviews.text: Installed these in the ceiling of a spare bedroom. Template to cut was accurate ... no big surprise there. Mounted to the ceiling snugly and easily - typical of other brands I've installed so also no big surprise. The speaker cover was a bit of a tight fit, but not anything to complain about. In the end, the sound is warm, can get louder than I would want, and is clean at the lowest listening levels. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Bertram Joseph

customer_reviews.title: best value for the money.need right receiver!
customer_reviews.text: They get loud and are very detailed.very good sound for cost.would buy again in a heartbeat.still using these 4 years later!I just got a Sony receiver to replace my pioneer elite receiver.wow what a difference it made!these speakers came alive!home theater detail is incredible now!it sounds amazing!these speakers need the right receiver to sound right! Pioneer and onkyo are not the right receiver!Sony or murantz!and the difference is night and day!
customer_reviews.author: T. Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Fills Two Rooms
customer_reviews.text: I love my six Klipsch 6.5” Ceiling Speakers R-1650C that I installed in my new house. I used one Klipsch Center Speaker RP-404C, a Denon AVR-X3200 AV Receiver and Mediabridge 14AWG wiring for my surround sound system. I have not added any subwoofers, yet. It has a great bass sound without it. The surround sound created by the DENON & Klipsch speakers fills two rooms.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Surround Sound System Complete and Sounds Great
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased Klipsch Center, Front speakers and Sub-Woofer earlier in the year and was very impressed in the sound & output... purchased these ceiling mount speakers to complete the Klipsch speaker system and very happy with the full range sound I'm getting with Klipsch "running the show" now.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald G Hurt

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: We finally took the huge speakers off our wall and put these in the ceiling. The sound certainly can't compete with the more powerful speakers, but just the same, we are very happy with these. The sound is nice and clear (but maybe not as full). The price we paid was MUCH less than what Best Buy sells for the exact speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Anne-Marie

customer_reviews.title: Bought 4 of these bad boys and can’t be any happier
customer_reviews.text: Bought 4 of these bad boys and can’t be any happier. Construction and size is great. Used a few times so far and work great. Clear sound and bass. Going to purchase 2 more in the near future to complete Dolby atmos
customer_reviews.author: LUCKY SARAI

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sound great for what we use it for movies
customer_reviews.text: Perfect sound great for what we use it for movies
customer_reviews.author: tvsteve

customer_reviews.title: Sound good for the money
customer_reviews.text: They sound good for the money. On the other hand the grills are not fun to put on.
customer_reviews.author: Cable933

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the everyday'er
customer_reviews.text: Remodeled our game room downstairs. After all the research, it came down to these. Not the most expensive and not the cheapest, but all the reviews looked good to me. Bought 4 for the room. The room is 35' x 20'. These are easy to mount and virtually hide in the ceiling tiles. I'm not testing all the db's and what nots, just want some decent back ground music during poker games. These work great. No distortion and I'll will eventually hook these up thru my amp to the tv. Should be great for ball games. Would I buy them again, no doubt.
customer_reviews.author: D. Nicolich

customer_reviews.title: I had the " Geek SQ " from Best Buy hook these up
customer_reviews.text: I had the " Geek SQ " from Best Buy hook these up. They work great for me. Every thing you need is in the box. I mounted 4 speakers in the ceiling. They go with my Onkyo TX-646 receiver. Awesome sound !!!
customer_reviews.author: sheldon morgan

customer_reviews.title: Really Good Speakers for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent speakers to use for Dolby Atmos. I kind of wished i would have purchased the ones with the directional tweeters. For the price, these were still a really good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn G

customer_reviews.title: Awsome sound
customer_reviews.text: I bought these speakers to install as ceiling mounted rear speakers for my surround sound system at home. They were easily installed. The sound quality is great whether they are being used as rear speakers for TV surround sound system or just music reproduction. They have lived up to the Klipsch reputation for fine products.
customer_reviews.author: george k. smith

customer_reviews.title: Sound great. Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Sound great. Easy to install. Be sure to check the depth of where they are going, these are a bit deeper than others of similar size.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: These speakers have been a great addition to our house
customer_reviews.text: These speakers have been a great addition to our house. There are four of them mounted in the ceiling in our bar and are matched with a wireless subwoofer a SW10i. A great combination and I highly recommend these to anyone!! Great price and sound!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound.
customer_reviews.text: We love this speaker and it sounds great. I am not a sound engineer but I am going to change all of my speakers to Klipsch after trying this out.
customer_reviews.author: M. K. Kurtzman

customer_reviews.title: just what i wanted
customer_reviews.text: I bought these speaker for my rear surround. It sound great without being obviously visible. Installation was very easy. I use the box it come in as a back cover, since I don't want the fiberglass insulation to get into the speaker. Took be about an hour to install (house is prewired).
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Lam

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: My husband installed these himself in our living room ceiling. Have had them for over a year. Works great. Easily installed.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Worth The Money
customer_reviews.text: It comes with a matching color cover, and everything you need to mount it. Cut the hole with provided templet, hook up two wires, tighten 4 screws and snap on the face plate. Turn up your Sonos and enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: JaworskiKey

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and a good price. I used the pair as my atmos setup speakers. It does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: nice sounds
customer_reviews.text: Great sounds....but very tough to tighten the screws. Looks good and easy to install. Worth the price. Easy to handle.
customer_reviews.author: christine

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly rich sound
customer_reviews.text: I would highly recommend this speaker - really easy to install and the sound is WAY BETTER than expected for the speaker price.
customer_reviews.author: Trying to do my best

customer_reviews.title: Good quality speakers for descent price
customer_reviews.text: Good quality speakers for descent price. The only thing i give it 4 instead of 5 stars is the screws are hard to tighten i only installed 5 and it tires me off but after that it's awesome i got alot of complement already on how they sound clearly and loud.
customer_reviews.author: Newswatch

customer_reviews.title: Five star for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Just installed two of these in our rear yard patio and they sound VERY good for the price. I'm about as picky as they come when it comes to my speakers. These deliver excellent clarity at low volumes and actually have some bass to them, however note I do have a def tech aw 6500 on the trim line of the patio blasting into the pool. These are a perfect addition for when people are in the patio area. Install was simple, even for this hack. Flush mount looks great and high WAF (wife approval rating).
customer_reviews.author: Critically acclaimed

customer_reviews.title: this has given us a fabulous sound system.
customer_reviews.text: this has given us a fabulous sound system. thank you
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: These little speakers sound great. Very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: These little speakers sound great. Very easy to install. I installed them in the ceiling as rear speakers. I recommend if using to enhance your surround or to use as "B" speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Reedy

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great
customer_reviews.text: Sound great and they were cheaper than I had thought they would be.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: A+ speaker for someone looking for seamless looking 5.1
customer_reviews.text: I love these speakers. I ordered and installed these to have rear surround with the rest of my Klipsch system in my living room. For the price, you can't beat these. Installation was straightforward even though it required cutting out junction boxes and guessing which wires in my A/V cabinet went to these particular speakers.
customer_reviews.author: LH_KUSMU

customer_reviews.title: BestBuy wouldn't match Amazon price
customer_reviews.text: Half the price than the same model at BestBuy. Sound great and easy on the wallet
customer_reviews.author: Ormondbeacher

customer_reviews.title: ... of these speaker and they are working flawlessly Really liked these
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two of these speaker and they are working flawlessly Really liked these speakers
customer_reviews.author: Mireya Mejia

customer_reviews.title: Good Price and good sound
customer_reviews.text: Bought five to be used in home entertainment system. Had Geek squad install with no problems. Very happy with sound and looks.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Adams

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: High quality, well made speakers. Easy to install and sound great. Would recommend to anyone. Price is much better than local retailer.
customer_reviews.author: James I. Pendergraph

customer_reviews.title: good sound and well made
customer_reviews.text: I put these in my kitchen, and they are good sounding speakers , for the size. There are similar brands, but you can"t beat the quality and performance of Klipsch.
customer_reviews.author: Itchfen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice sound for the price. Installed 4 in the ceiling.
customer_reviews.author: D. Staggs

customer_reviews.title: Christmas purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these and installed them in my elderly parents ceiling as a Christmas present. Hearing the TV is longer a problem. The install was easy with the enclosed template.
customer_reviews.author: Mark O. Ditter

customer_reviews.title: Sounds Great
customer_reviews.text: GREAT VALUE! Great for the the surround sound for the price. Unless you are building a professional media room this is perfect for anything else. Of course if you are build a professional media you would not be purchasing the cheap stuff.
customer_reviews.author: John Burton

customer_reviews.title: great speakers for the price
customer_reviews.text: great speakers for the price. If you want a noticeable upgrade you will need to spend triple the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Speakers
customer_reviews.text: Everyrhing I needed in ceiling speakers for a great price
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Good value hall speakers
customer_reviews.text: Needed drop in replacements for a different brand that had failed after many years and were no longer available. These ended up being the right diameter. They have good sensitivity so I get a little more volume in the church hallway than before. The sound fine but I wasn't looking for super HiFi speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Laidlaw

customer_reviews.title: Awesome speakers, easy to install
customer_reviews.text: These speakers were a snap to install in a drywall wall using the supplied template. They have a simple but effective system of mounting to the back of the drywall - although I did find that the mounting screws required considerable force to turn - they will definitely test your grip strength. But once in place, the speakers sound fabulous as one would expect from Klipsch.
customer_reviews.author: S. Gnatz

customer_reviews.title: Crystal Clear Sound !
customer_reviews.text: I purchase two more of these to complete my Dolby 7.1 home theater system. High Quality, easy install, great sound. Well worth the money....
customer_reviews.author: Harley Ultra Classic

customer_reviews.title: great sound, easy install, great price
customer_reviews.text: Retrofit installation design is very nice, pulls it nice and snug to the drywall. Spray painted the rim and grill to match bright white ceiling and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Ekewaka

customer_reviews.title: Bought these to add to our current surroundsound perfect product!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these to add to our current surroundsound. Product as described.
customer_reviews.author: RW

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sound clarity... Very easy install... Finally a company that provides a cardboard installation template...
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: AMAZON HAD THE BEST PRICE, WE PURCHASED 14 OF THEM 7 FOR ...
customer_reviews.text: AMAZON HAD THE BEST PRICE, WE PURCHASED 14 OF THEM 7 FOR DOWNSTAIRS AND 7 FOR UPSTAIRS GAME ROOM. VERY GOOD, SHIPPED EXTREMLY QUICK.
customer_reviews.author: sh43591

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install and look great once in place. The amazing sound is just another plus added
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: great sound for room 20X 20 and hallways. The white color finish blend well with the ceiling.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Olivas-Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound and build quality, as expected from Klipsch. Very easy to install using the included 8" circle template.
customer_reviews.author: Backpacker Dan

customer_reviews.title: In ceiling speakers
customer_reviews.text: Hi these spreakers were easy to install, and the sound is great.Matches up well with new style recievers with crisp lows and smooth base.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Gurecki

customer_reviews.title: not happy with the speakers
customer_reviews.text: I installed on the ceiling of my basement. I hardly could hear sound from the speakers. only when I increase to full volume the sound comes on these. not happy with the speakers..
customer_reviews.author: Pals

customer_reviews.title: Great..!
customer_reviews.text: The installation was so simple , and my customer is so happy with his new sound. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Espinoza

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase, great sound and great look!
customer_reviews.text: I was considering upgrading my sound system and saw this speaker in bestbuy. The sound is great and the way they disappear in the ceiling just makes them better. Purchased five and i can not be happier. The installation was so easy, the only challenge was running the cables. I had Bose speakers before and yes, the sound is terrific but i needed to consider the look at this time and Klipsch delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Pineda

product_meta.title: Klipsch R-1650-C In-Ceiling Speaker - White (Each)
product_meta.description: The Klipsch R-1650-C brings dynamic acoustic performance to both home and commercial environments.
feature_bullets: Perfect for those who want excellent performance, reliability and durability at an affordable price, the R-1650-C brings dynamic acoustic performance to both home and commercial environments.
The R-1650-C employs a 6.5-inch polymer-cone woofer and a large motor structure for high sensitivity. A coaxially mounted 1-inch polymer-dome tweeter distributes smooth, clear highs over a wide area.
The speakers mounting system makes installation a breeze, while its paintable aluminum grille provides added rust protection in moisture-prone areas such as bathrooms, kitchens and saunas.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars141 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
